_header: God Almighty that all thing wields / Winds waters woods and fields
Title(s): Handlyng Synne ; Septem Miracula de corpore cristi
_description: An extract from Robert of Brunne’s Handlyng Synne (1283) (lines 9891-10810) with the title: Septem Miracula de corpore cristi

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
GOd Almihti þat alle þing weldesWyndes watres wodes and
                    ffeldes…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat Bodi and soule he wol vs saueAnd we him to loue and
                    he us to haue. Amen
